data.eml:eml: Revision of the African shieldbug genus Afrius Stål, 1870 (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Pentatomidae: Asopinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Roell, Talita, Lemaître, Valérie A., Webb, Michael D. (2019): Revision of the African shieldbug genus Afrius Stål, 1870 (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Pentatomidae: Asopinae). European Journal of Taxonomy 520: 1-44, DOI: https://doi.org/10.5852/ejt.2019.520
